rows.label: qst104223_msg0001
rows.name:
Ding-dong!
Rex-sensei! I've got a question!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0002
rows.name:
I found a piece of rock near the
Village Guardian the other day
with this weird old writing on it!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0003
rows.name: Can you read this squiggly stuff?

rows.label: qst104223_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course! I'm pretty good at
reading ancient writing.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0022
rows.name:
Wow, Rex-sensei! You're amazing!
D'you think I could learn to
read this stuff too someday?

rows.label: qst104223_msg0023
rows.name:
You're a really hard worker,
Martis, so I bet you could learn
to read it if you tried.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0024
rows.name:
All right! I'll study hard to see
if I can read what's on that stone!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0025
rows.name: Right, next up is Kazuna's question.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0041
rows.name:
Squiggly writing, huh...
That might be a bit tricky.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0042
rows.name:
Oh, really?
I'll try asking the history teacher
when they get here, then!

rows.label: qst104223_msg0043
rows.name:
You're a hard worker, Martis, so
you could probably learn to read
it yourself if you tried.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0044
rows.name: Right, next up is Kazuna's question.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0101
rows.name:
You're not Rex-sensei! I thought Rex-sensei
was going to give us a lesson?

rows.label: qst104223_msg0201
rows.name:
You should go answer
Kazuna's question next.

rows.label: qst104223_msg0202
rows.name:
You should go answer
Kukuri's question next.
